GMSCR.settings.columns.Name: Columns
GMSCR.settings.columns.Hint: How many columns do you want? Changing this may require a grid clear.
GMSCR.settings.rows.Name: Rows
GMSCR.settings.rows.Hint: How many rows do you want? Changing this may require a grid clear.
GMSCR.settings.reset.Name: Reset
GMSCR.settings.reset.Hint: Clear the Grid entries. This action can not be undone.
GMSCR.settings.display-as-drawer.Name: Display as Drawer
GMSCR.settings.display-as-drawer.Hint: Display the GM Screen as a drawer on the bottom of the screen, as opposed to a normal dialog. If you want to use PopOut, set this to false.
GMSCR.warnings.clearConfirm.Title: Clear Grid
GMSCR.warnings.clearConfirm.Content: Are you sure you want to clear the grid entries? This action can not be undone.
